subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Omar Minaya, the Mets’ general manager, met with the free agent Francisco Rodríguez in a prelude to talks that could net the team a new closer by the end of the week.
snippet: Omar Minaya, the Mets’ general manager, met with the free agent Francisco Rodríguez in a prelude to talks that could net the team a new closer by the end of the week.
